body:
A Couple days a go i made a decision that id leave until avicus came back so i said a im leaving then TOMOROW Avicus was fine so i sad Im already Back lock the thingy Up Then the next Dat here comes troll doozie Saying PLEASE DO NOT MAKE FAKE POSTS
So i went on avicus AND BOOM U have been tempbanned for making a fake Post.
